message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $9,500. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $7,500 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $8,500 to make this happen.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested.

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $8,500, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm thinking more along the lines of $8,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure I get the best deal possible.
